original_text:
Butterfly Staxx 2
Non è raro che siano gli animali ad essere protagonisti nel mondo delle slot machine. Spesso si utilizzano bestie mitologiche che abbiano in qualche modo un richiamo ai soldi e ai tesori. Basti pensare a quanto siano abusati i draghi nel mondo delle slot, o le fenici che rappresentano la speranza di una rinascita come quella che può derivare da un’improvvisa vincita.
La NetEnt, con la slot Butterfly Staxx 2, si muove verso una direzione diversa: non un animale fiero e feroce come il drago, ma la bellezza passeggera ed eterea delle farfalle, in una slot che punta tanto a divertire il giocatore, quanto a rilassarlo.
Grafica della slot machine
Prima di passare all’argomento saliente della nostra recensione, in cui andremo a parlare delle funzioni e dei bonus che possono essere trovati all’interno di questa slot, fermiamoci un attimo ad apprezzare il lato grafico e musicale di Butterfly Staxx 2 della NetEnt.
D’altronde, come siamo soliti dire, anche l’occhio (e l’orecchio) vuole la sua parte: una slot può avere funzioni interessanti, ma se si rivela essere una cacofonia ingiocabile, queste passano in secondo piano.
Butterfly Staxx 2 ci accoglie con una fievole musica di atmosfera, calandoci immediatamente nella distesa floreale che compone i simboli della stessa slot. La musica stessa, a differenza di altri giochi simili, non cessa al momento di girare i rulli, ma sono quest’ultimi che si adeguano all’atmosfera di rilassamento della slot.
Infatti il suono dei rulli è appena un tintinnio, lungo i quali è possibile trovare i classici simboli delle carte da gioco (A, K, Q, J…) così come farfalle e fiori di diverso tipo.
Una slot quindi che si differenzia dalla massa per la sua capacità di non gridare nelle orecchie del giocatore, ma di farlo rilassare dopo una lunga giornata di lavoro.
Le funzioni e i bonus della slot
Passiamo a quello che ci interessa maggiormente: da un punto di vista tecnico, che tipo di slot ci troviamo di fronte?
Butterfly Staxx 2 della NetEnt utilizza una griglia di gioco 5×4, leggermente diversa dallo stile più diffuso 5×3. Cosa cambia fra questi due? Innanzitutto a ogni turno ci verranno mostrati venti simboli al posto dei classici quindici. Questo numero maggiore di simboli per ogni giocata aumenta anche il numero di combinazioni ottenibili.
Si parla infatti di quaranta linee di vincita con un RTP stimato (in quanto può variare sostanzialmente nel breve periodo) di 96.35%.
I simboli da tenere d’occhio? L’orchidea viola è un simbolo Wild e in quanto tale può sostituire qualsiasi altro simbolo normale nel comporre le varie combinazioni (si parla quindi di un Jolly).
La farfalla d’oro, invece, permette di ottenere accesso ai giri gratuiti. Questa funzionalità, molto comune nelle slot, prende una forma leggermente diversa rispetto al solito: se i due rulli a sinistra vengono ricoperti di farfalle d’oro, si otterrà una seconda griglia di gioco durante questa modalità. Se i rulli a sinistra della seconda griglia vengono ricoperti, si otterrà una terza griglia. Inutile dire quanto avere più griglie a disposizione aumenti esponenzialmente la probabilità di vincita.
Slot simili a Butterly Staxx 2
Se ti è piaciuta questa slot machine e vuoi provare qualche gioco simile, possiamo consigliarti qualche titolo simile. Sempre della NetEnt, sullo stile naturale e rilassato, troviamo Trolls ed Evolution. Naturalmente ogni slot è diversa dall’altra, ma in generale la NetEnt si fa pregio di utilizzare molti elementi onirici all’interno dei propri giochi, come nel caso di Fairytale Legends.
Se invece cerchiamo una slot sempre a tema floreale, possiamo suggerire Jade Butterly della Pragmatic Play.

raw_translation.response:
Butterfly Staxx 2
It is not uncommon for animals to be the protagonists in the world of slot machines. Mythical beasts are often used that have some kind of appeal to money and treasure. Just think of how overused dragons are in the world of slots, or phoenixes that represent the hope of a rebirth as can come from a sudden win.
NetEnt, with the slot Butterfly Staxx 2, moves in a different direction: not a proud and fierce animal like the dragon, but the fleeting and ethereal beauty of butterflies, in a slot that aims to entertain the player as much as to relax them.
Graphics of the Slot Machine
Before diving into the main topic of our review, where we will talk about the functions and bonuses that can be found within this slot, let's take a moment to appreciate the graphic and musical side of NetEnt's Butterfly Staxx 2.
After all, as we like to say, the eye (and ear) wants its part too: a slot may have interesting functions, but if it turns out to be an unplayable cacophony, these are in second place.
Butterfly Staxx 2 greets us with a faint ambient music, immediately immersing us in the floral expanse that makes up the symbols of the slot. The music itself, unlike other similar games, does not stop when the reels are spinning, but it is the latter that adapts to the relaxing atmosphere of the slot.
In fact, the sound of the reels is just a jingle, along which it is possible to find the classic symbols of playing cards (A, K, Q, J...) as well as butterflies and various types of flowers.
A slot, therefore, that differs from the mass for its ability to not scream in the player's ear, but to relax them after a long day of work.
The Functions and Bonuses of the Slot
Let's move on to what interests us most: from a technical point of view, what kind of slot are we facing?
NetEnt's Butterfly Staxx 2 uses a 5x4 game grid, slightly different from the more common 5x3 style. What changes between these two? First of all, each turn will show us twenty symbols instead of the classic fifteen. This larger number of symbols for each play also increases the number of combinations that can be obtained.
In fact, we are talking about forty pay lines with an estimated RTP (as it can vary substantially in the short term) of 96.35%.
The symbols to keep an eye on? The purple orchid is a Wild symbol and as such can replace any other normal symbol in composing the various combinations (thus referred to as a Joker).
The golden butterfly, on the other hand, allows access to free spins. This feature, very common in slots, takes a slightly different form than usual: if the two left reels are covered with golden butterflies, a second game grid will be obtained during this mode. If the left reels of the second grid are covered, a third grid will be obtained. Needless to say, having more grids available exponentially increases the chance of winning.
Slots similar to Butterfly Staxx 2
If you liked this slot machine and want to try some similar games, we can recommend a few similar titles. Always from NetEnt, in the natural and relaxed style, we find Trolls and Evolution. Of course, every slot is different from the other, but in general NetEnt prides itself on using many dreamlike elements within its games, as in the case of Fairytale Legends.
If we instead look for a slot still on a floral theme, we can suggest Jade Butterfly from Pragmatic Play.

Review: Butterfly Staxx 2
It's not uncommon for animals to be the main characters in the world of slot machines. Often, mythological creatures that somehow appeal to wealth and treasure are used. Just think of how overused dragons are in the world of slots, or phoenixes that represent the hope of rebirth, much like what can come from a sudden win.

NetEnt, with the Butterfly Staxx 2 slot, moves in a different direction: not a proud and fierce animal like the dragon, but the fleeting and ethereal beauty of butterflies, in a slot that aims to both entertain and relax the player.

Graphics of the slot machine
Before we get to the main topic of our review, where we'll talk about the functions and bonuses that can be found within this slot, let's take a moment to appreciate the graphical and musical side of NetEnt's Butterfly Staxx 2.

After all, as we often say, the eye (and ear) also wants its share: a slot may have interesting functions, but if it turns out to be an unplayable cacophony, these functions are secondary.

Butterfly Staxx 2 welcomes us with a gentle atmospheric music, immediately immersing us in the floral expanse that makes up the symbols of the slot. The music itself, unlike other similar games, does not stop when the reels are spinning, but rather the reels themselves adapt to the relaxing atmosphere of the slot.

In fact, the sound of the reels is just a tinkling, along which it's possible to find the classic symbols of playing cards (A, K, Q, J...) as well as butterflies and various flowers.

A slot that stands out from the crowd for its ability to not shout in the player's ears, but to relax them after a long day at work.

Functions and bonuses of the slot
Let's move on to what interests us most: from a technical point of view, what kind of slot are we dealing with?

NetEnt's Butterfly Staxx 2 uses a 5x4 game grid, slightly different from the more common 5x3. What's the difference between these two? Firstly, in each round, we'll be shown twenty symbols instead of the classic fifteen. This greater number of symbols per play also increases the number of combinations obtainable.

In fact, we're talking about forty win lines with an estimated RTP (as it can vary substantially in the short term) of 96.35%.

Which symbols should we keep an eye on? The purple orchid is a Wild symbol and as such can replace any other normal symbol in composing the various combinations (we're talking about a Joker).

The golden butterfly, instead, allows access to free spins. This function, very common in slots, takes a slightly different form than usual: if the two reels to the left are covered with golden butterflies, a second game grid will be obtained during this mode. If the reels to the left of the second grid are covered, a third grid will be obtained. Needless to say, having more grids available exponentially increases the chances of winning.

Slots similar to Butterfly Staxx 2
If you liked this slot machine and want to try some similar games, we can recommend a few titles. Also from NetEnt, with a natural and relaxed style, we have Trolls and Evolution. Of course, every slot is different from another, but in general, NetEnt prides itself on using many dreamlike elements within its own games, as is the case with Fairytale Legends.

If, on the other hand, we're looking for a slot still with a floral theme, we can suggest Jade Butterfly from Pragmatic Play.
